experience: You and Ambarish both know David Stark, Gary Bennett, and 8 others

One day left for the holiday...however, I feel excited to meet candidates for my team. We are still hiring, multiple openings in my team which are not posted to public yet. There are openings in other team as well. Let me know if you are interested in working @Amazon:) Good luck everyone! Enjoy the reset of the long holiday!

Gaur Gopal das received an award from YouTube for getting 100,000 subscribers. Thank you for everyone who has subscribed and watched his  videos so far! Without you none of this would be possible. It’s so encouraging to see the continued support that he has as he tries to create an online community centred around love, gratitude and happiness.

Special thanks for Bhavik Patel, Paresh Kocharekar, Mabick Thappa, Sankarshan Charan das and Vinay Raniga for their support and strategy to grow Gaur Gopal das’ online presence. Mabick has especially excelled in creating high quality films!

YouTube is a platform that has been inspiring people with a purpose to share their message for over ten years now. We want to thank them for this award as it excites and encourages us to what’s possible in the future. If you haven’t subscribed to Gaur Gopal das’ YouTube channel, please do so now. Thank you for joining the ever expanding community. Let’s make a difference!
Computer Science Tutor, Ira. A Fulton School of Engineering, Arizona State University
Currently a Computer Science Tutor at Arizona State University in the Computing, Informatics and Decision Systems Engineering Department belonging to Ira. A Fulton School of Engineering.

• Domains/Tech: Docker, Kubernetes, OpenShift - xPaaS,Jenkins (Groovy) for CI/CD, YAML, IBM MQ, Kafka• Primary work function involves CI / CD of applications at Florida Blue based on the Red Hat OpenShift PaaS solutions. • Working on IBM MQ solutions and Kafka to understand how message queuing is implemented for client server communications at the organization and understanding the middleware architecture.
Involved with research on cryptocurrency, bitcoins and mobile application development in Android and Windows platforms.
I was involved with working on macros in excel and implementation of automated tools for quick data adaptations for multiple applications.
I'm currently pursuing Master's in Computer Science
I'm currently pursuing Master's in Computer Science
In-depth knowledge in my field of study, Computer Science, coupled with involving myself in extra-curricular activities by being an executive member in the Literary Club in college.
